actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from acquiring by condemnation and land for the Appomattox Court House National Historical Park.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from acquiring by condemnation any land for the Appomattox Court House National Historical Park in the State of Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from acquiring by condemnation and land for the Appomattox Court House National Historical Park.
